name: Alex Basics: Remastered (Demo)
description:
Alex Basics has returned

After a few years Alex is back, better graphics and gameplay, more story line and items... in the future.

This is a demo of Alex Basics in Biology and Zoology: Remastered, it demonstrates the graphics and gameplay elements, physics and triggers, concepts and ideas.

For now it is a fun sandbox you can play around with different objects and test the things around on many test levels. Tell me what you think on the comments or in EternityDev discord server.

Please support me on Patreon, i have alot of ideas and things to make and working on this game is quite difficult by myself.

(also pixel blood and gore content warning so yeah lol)

Controls:

WASD - move
Left Shift - run
Left Ctrl - crouch
LMB - grab\drag\use item on object
RMB - use item\throw
R - drop\grab object action\rotate
Mouse Wheel - scroll through inventory
Q - spawn menu
E - use\pickup
TAB - craft menu
ALT - control Scrina
ESC - pause
V - noclip

How to: Rotate grabbed object: grab object (LMB), hold R and move your mouse

Put item in a bin\container: select an item, hold Shift and press E

Take item from container: use the container (press E)

Craft: collect all necessary items, hold TAB and click on item slot to craft
